name: Spartina's Roasted Cod With Nicoise Vinaigrette
keywords: cod, marinated anchovy fillets, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, main course
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 500 degrees. Mix anchovies, capers, olives, shallot and garlic with 1/3 cup olive oil and the vinegar. Season with salt and pepper.
Heat remaining oil in an oven-proof skillet. Season cod with salt and pepper, place in skillet and sear on one side until golden, about 2 minutes. Turn and place in oven until done, about 5 minutes.
Place a cod fillet on each of 4 plates. Spoon about 2 tablespoons of anchovy sauce on top.
